statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_position, player_age FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_age, player_position FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_position FROM player_profiles WHERE player_age > 25;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE player_height > 6.0;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM player_profiles WHERE player_age > 25 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_age, player_position, player_height FROM player_profiles WHERE player_position = 'Forward' AND player_height > 190;
SELECT player_name, player_birthdate FROM player_profiles WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM player_birthdate) = 1998;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players, AVG(player_weight) AS average_weight FROM player_profiles WHERE player_height < 180;
SELECT player_name, player_age, player_height, player_weight FROM player_profiles WHERE player_age < 30 ORDER BY player_age, player_height DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE age > 25
SELECT player_name, age, position FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE height > 6.0 ORDER BY player_name
SELECT player_name, position FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE weight > 180 ORDER BY position ASC
SELECT player_name, age, weight FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE age < 25 AND height < 6.0
SELECT player_name, age, position FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE position='Forward' OR position='Midfielder'
SELECT player_id, player_name, age, position, height, weight FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT player_name, age, position, overall_rating FROM PlayerProfiles JOIN Evaluations ON PlayerProfiles.player_id = Evaluations.player_id WHERE overall_rating > 80 ORDER BY overall_rating DESC
SELECT player_name, age, position, overall_rating FROM PlayerProfiles JOIN Evaluations ON PlayerProfiles.player_id = Evaluations.player_id WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC
SELECT player_name, position, overall_rating FROM PlayerProfiles JOIN Evaluations ON PlayerProfiles.player_id = Evaluations.player_id WHERE position = 'Midfielder' ORDER BY overall_rating DESC
SELECT player_name, age, position, height, weight FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE height > 180 AND weight <= 80 ORDER BY weight ASC
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_id, player_name, position FROM player_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT player_name, age, height FROM player_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_name, position, weight FROM player_profiles WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_id, evaluator_name, evaluation_date, performance_score FROM evaluations WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT player_id, player_name, age, position FROM player_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT player_id, player_name, height, weight FROM player_profiles WHERE position = 'Forward' ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, age, position, height, weight FROM player_profiles JOIN evaluations ON player_profiles.player_id = evaluations.player_id WHERE performance_score > 80;

SELECT player_id, evaluator_name, evaluation_date, performance_score, player_name FROM evaluations JOIN player_profiles ON evaluations.player_id = player_profiles.player_id WHERE performance_score < 60;
SELECT player_id, phone_number, email, address FROM contact_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' OR email LIKE '%example.com%' ORDER BY player_id ASC, contact_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM players
SELECT player_name, position FROM players ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT age, height FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward'
SELECT player_name, age, height FROM players WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT team_name, city FROM teams
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_name, position, age, height FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward' ORDER BY age;
SELECT player_name, position, height, weight FROM players WHERE position = 'Guard' ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC;
SELECT players.player_name, teams.team_name FROM players JOIN teams ON players.player_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT players.player_name, contact_info.email, teams.city FROM players JOIN contact_info ON players.player_id = contact_info.player_id JOIN teams ON players.player_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM player_profiles WHERE age > 20;
SELECT last_name, first_name, age FROM player_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT height, weight FROM player_profiles WHERE height >= 5.5;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, position FROM player_profiles WHERE age >= 20 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, established_year FROM teams WHERE established_year < 2000 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT evaluator_name, evaluation_date, overall_rating, comments FROM evaluations WHERE overall_rating > 8 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT email, phone_number, address FROM contact_information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY email ASC;

SELECT t.team_name, t.coach_name, tr.jersey_number, tr.roster_position FROM teams t JOIN team_roster tr ON t.id = tr.team_id WHERE tr.jersey_number < 20 ORDER BY t.team_name ASC, tr.jersey_number ASC;
